title: Becoming a Crossdressing Angel, I’ll Save the Hero - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Gender Bender   Romance   Shoujo
tags: Angels   Cross-dressing   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Heroes   Oneshot   Race Change   Younger Love Interests

description: I became an angel after I died, but for some reason I was mistaken as a male as I was dressed like one, and like that got the task to go to another world to save the hero. My angel name was Laguille. As Laguille, I became close to the hero, Ansel, but…?>
